Html:
Hmmm, so here is a very strange one. I'm using jquery .on click event of a rateit to trigger an update to an iframe. It works lovely on desktop. I click on the rateit, the stars update, and the iframe gets regenerated (it's a Google Map). However, if I try on mobile chrome, then the jquery event only gets fired if the user clicks either on the 5th star or the reset stars (-) symbol.

Ideas?

You can check the page here:

http://www.homeducate.me/en/index.htm

Scroll down to the map. Click on the stars and the map updates. Try on mobile. Map doesn't update if you click on stars 1 through 4.

Am I going mad?!? :)
